# Function stringifyContent

  * stringifyContent(event: [Event](../interfaces/Event.html)): string

Extracts and concatenates all text from the parts of a `Event` object.

#### Parameters

    * event: [Event](../interfaces/Event.html)

The `Event` object to process.

#### Returns string

A single string with the combined text.

    * Defined in [core/src/events/event.ts:150](https://github.com/google/adk-js/blob/6d1a56a15e0864ce1e83b259bc9964333503ff5a/core/src/events/event.ts#L150)
